name: German Federation for Plant Innovation
goal: The German Federation for Plant Innovation is a research association and has a long-lasting experience supporting research projects of German plant breeders especially SMEs. The GFPi was founded in 1908 and has more than 60 members. The GFPi connects plant breeders and scientists from academia to initiate public-private-partnership and carry out collective research projects on a pre-competitive level.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Education, Environment, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks
